This is a web application created by Turing School of Software Development Mod 2 students! In this project, we created a recipe tracking / meal planning application that allows users to view recipes they want to cook and plan shopping trips around them. Users should be able to view a list of recipes and choose recipes to cook! Enjoy!

INSTRUCTIONS

  1. Watch how to make this recipe.
  2. In a large bowl, whisk together buttermilk, eggs, baking powder, sugar, salt and butter.
  3. In another large bowl mix together all-purpose flour and buckwheat flour.
  4. Remove the pan from the oven and let sit for 10 minutes before removing onto a cooling rack.Top with ice cream and a drizzle of chocolate sauce.
